start_legion: The Legion is running towards the chat 🔪 (!killer)
on_dead: @USERNAME didn't mend and got slugged 💀 Gamer is now timed out 💀
frenzy_timeout: The Legion failed miserably and left in disgrace 🔪
on_unhooked: @USERNAME has been unhooked and fully healed
on_hook_camp: The Legion ran past the hooked @USERNAME 🔪 Are they proxycamping? 🔪
on_dead_camp: The Legion ran past the slugged @USERNAME 🔪 Are they proxycamping? 🔪
on_frenzy_miss: The Legion missed @USERNAME and left in disgrace 🔪
on_frenzy_hit: The Legion hit @USERNAME 🔪 They need to mend or they receive timeout 🔪 (!mend, !heal @USERNAME)
on_frenzy_ban_hit: The Legion hit @USERNAME 🔪 They need to mend or they will get permabanned 🔪 (!mend)
on_frenzy_hit_prefinal: The Legion hit @USERNAME 🔪 They need to mend or they receive timeout 🔪 The next hit will be fatal! 🔪 (!mend, !heal @USERNAME)
on_frenzy_hit_dead: The Legion has downed and hooked @USERNAME 🔪 Unhook this gamer! 🔪 (!unhook @USERNAME)
on_frenzy_hit_deep_wound: The Legion hit @USERNAME 🔪 But they were already deep wounded 🔪 The Legion has left in disgrace 🔪
pallet_wasted: @USERNAME dropped a pallet without anyone nearby, what a waste 💀
pallet_failed: @USERNAME tried to stun The Legion with a pallet and failed miserably 🔪 They are going to take a hit now... 🔪
pallet_success: @USERNAME stunned The Legion with a pallet 🔪 The Legion has left in disgrace 🔪
locker_wasted: @USERNAME tried to use Head On without anyone nearby 💀
locker_failed: @USERNAME tried to use Head On on The Legion, but failed miserably 🔪 They are going to take a hit now... 🔪
locker_success: @USERNAME stunned The Legion with Head On 🔪 The Legion has left in disgrace 🔪
locker_grab: The Legion grabbed @USERNAME out of the locker and hooked them 🔪 Unhook this gamer! 🪝 (!unhook @USERNAME)
tbag_success: @USERNAME tbagged and caught The Legion's attention 🔪
start_gf: Ghost Face started monitoring the chat 👻 (!killer)
gf_go_away: The Ghost Face silently left 👻 He managed to look at COUNT gamers 👻
gf_tbag: @USERNAME t-bagged and caught The Ghost Face's attention 👻
gf_hit_dead: The Ghost Face has downed and hooked @USERNAME 🔪 Unhook this gamer! 🔪 (!unhook @USERNAME)
gf_revealed: The Ghost Face has been revealed by @USERNAME 👻
gf_reveal_fail: @USERNAME could not reveal The Ghost Face👻
start_doctor: The Doctor has applied shock therapy 🧠 (!killer)
doctor_go_away: Chat has successfully survived the shock therapy 🧠
